title: Independence and matching number of some graphs
abstract: For a graph G, let n(G), $$\alpha (G)$$ and $$\beta (G)$$ be its order, independence number and matching number, respectively. We showed that $$\frac{\Delta (G)+k}{4}\alpha (G) + \beta (G) \ge n(G)$$ for some $$K_k$$ -free graph G with $$\Delta (G)\ge k-1\ge 2$$ .
